00027     QMApplication::QMApplication()
00028 {
00029     CalculatorFactory::RegisterAll();
00030 }
00031 
00032 QMApplication::~QMApplication()
00033 {}
00034 
00035 void QMApplication::Initialize(void)
00036 {
00037     // register all io plugins
00038     TrajectoryWriter::RegisterPlugins();
00039     TrajectoryReader::RegisterPlugins();
00040     TopologyReader::RegisterPlugins();
00041     CalculatorFactory::RegisterAll();
00042 
00043     AddProgramOptions()
00044         ("segments,s", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "  description of conjugated segments")
00045         ("options,o", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "  program and calculator options")
00046         ("file,f", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "  sqlite state file")
00047         ("first-frame,i", boost::program_options::value<int>()->default_value(1), "  start frame (first frame is 1)")
00048         ("nframes,n", boost::program_options::value<int>()->default_value(-1), "  process so many frames")
00049         //  this is shit, move it out!
00050         //("nnnames", boost::program_options::value<string>()->default_value("*"), "  List of strings that the concatenation of the two molnames must match to be analyzed")
00051         ;
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool QMApplication::EvaluateOptions(void)
00055 {
00056     CheckRequired("segments", "please provide an xml file with the description of segments.");
00057     CheckRequired("options", "please provide an xml file with the program options");
00058     CheckRequired("file", "no database file specified");
00059     return true;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void QMApplication::Run()
00063 {
00064     _qmtop.LoadListCharges(_op_vm["segments"].as<string>());
00065     // read in program options from options.xml
00066     load_property_from_xml(_options, _op_vm["options"].as<string>());
00067 
00068     int first_frame = OptionsMap()["first-frame"].as<int>(); 
00069     if(first_frame == 0) throw std::runtime_error("error, first frame is 0 but we start counting with 1");
00070     first_frame--;
00071 
00072     int nframes = OptionsMap()["nframes"].as<int>(); 
00073 
00074     BeginEvaluate();
00075 
00077     cout << "Loading qmtopology via state saver." << endl;
00078     string statefile = OptionsMap()["file"].as<string>();
00079     StateSaverSQLite loader;
00080     loader.Open(_qmtop, statefile);
00081     if(loader.FramesInDatabase() != 1)
00082         throw std::runtime_error("database contains none or more than one frame which is not supported yet.");
00083 
00084     while(loader.NextFrame()) {
00085         EvaluateFrame();
00086         loader.WriteFrame();
00087     }
00088     loader.Close();
00089     EndEvaluate();
00090 }
00091 
00092 void QMApplication::ShowHelpText(std::ostream &out)
00093 {
00094     string name =  ProgramName();
00095     if(VersionString() != "")
00096          name = name + ", version " + VersionString();
00097 
00098     votca::ctp::HelpTextHeader(name);
00099     HelpText(out);
00100     out << "\n\n" << OptionsDesc() << endl;
00101 }

00122 
00123 void QMApplication::AddCalculator(QMCalculator* calculator){
00124     _calculators.push_back(calculator);
00125 }
00126 
00127 void QMApplication::BeginEvaluate(){
00128     list<QMCalculator *>::iterator iter;
00129     for (iter = _calculators.begin(); iter != _calculators.end(); ++iter){
00130         (*iter)->Initialize(&_qmtop, &_options);
00131     }
00132 }
00133 
00134 bool QMApplication::EvaluateFrame(){
00135     list<QMCalculator *>::iterator iter;
00136     for (iter = _calculators.begin(); iter != _calculators.end(); ++iter){
00137         (*iter)->EvaluateFrame(&_qmtop);
00138     }
00139 }
00140 
00141 void QMApplication::EndEvaluate(){
00142     list<QMCalculator *>::iterator iter;
00143     for (iter = _calculators.begin(); iter != _calculators.end(); ++iter){
00144         (*iter)->EndEvaluate(&_qmtop);
00145     }
00146 }
